explains: n. 谈判者；磋商者；交涉者

sentences.cn: 他是个胸有成竹、很有信心的谈判者。

sentences.en: He is polished, charming, articulate, and an excellent negotiator.
sentences.cn: 他举止幽雅、富有魅力、善于表达，是个杰出的谈判者。

sentences.en: He is a tough negotiator. We did not expect to find him a pushover and he has not been one.
sentences.cn: 他是个难缠的谈判者。我们没有期望着能轻易将他说服，而他也证明了这一点。
